There is extra work here; additional drop targets were added to test dropping

Nicely done. Patches verified and committed to head.

A few minor changes were made:
1. fixed a few compile errors due to recent changes in HEAD.
2. deleted the old "drag" method and replaced it with Eric's more general
"dragAgnostic".
3. changed the detached suffix from "(detached)" to " - detached"... the JUnit
view doesn't seem to like test names containing brackets.
4. Removed the redundant calls to hideView in DragTest.doSetUp
5. Disabled all detached tests for platforms where detaching isn't supported
6. Moved the "off the window" test from the regular tests to the detached tests

Fixed.
